parts.text:
by logic if the tacher is going on car why would the status be billet reservee. thats one note. other note Here's a concise breakdown of the Reservation Interface functionalities for all mission and transport type combinations:

Reservation Interface Functionalities

Mission Nationale (National) Transport Mode Accountant Actions Key Features Voiture Personnelle (Personal Car) - Verify vehicle documents Calculate km compensation (e.g., 3 DH/km) Process daily allowance (1,000 DH/day) - No ticket booking Distance calculator tool Vehicle info validation Transport Public (Bus/Train) - Book/reimburse tickets Upload e-tickets Calculate daily allowance - Transport provider selection Cost tracking Receipt upload Mission Internationale (International) Transport Mode Accountant Actions Key Features Avion (Flight) - Book flights + hotels Upload e-tickets Process int'l allowance (2,000 DH/day) - Flight comparator Seat selection Visa requirement alerts so make the right changes for this and For National Missions (Morocco Only) City Selection: ✅ Yes, the teacher sees a dropdown of all Moroccan cities (pre-loaded in the system). Key Features for Teachers Smart Dropdown:

Shows only Moroccan cities (international missions use text field). Auto-Distance Calculator (if "Voiture Personnelle" selected) and i have all the cities and how far are they from the home uni in rabat file called cities.json Accountant's View Later Sees the teacher’s selected city + calculated km in the reservation interface. Accountant’s View for "Mission Nationale + Voiture Personnelle" (Simplified to only show critical info)

Core Details (Auto-Pulled from Teacher’s Submission) Teacher Name + Department Selected City (e.g., "Rabat")

Dates (Start/End) + Mission Purpose

Car Details:

License Plate

Make/Model

Insurance Validity

Financial Calculations (Auto-Generated) Distance: Teacher’s claimed km (e.g., "300 km")

System’s pre-loaded distance (e.g., "Rabat = 280 km")

Editable field (accountant can adjust if needed)

Compensation:

3 DH/km × [final km] → 840 DH (if accountant corrects to 280 km)

1,000 DH/day × [days] → 3,000 DH (for 3 days)

Total Estimated Payout: 3,840 DH (highlighted in bold)

Action Buttons ✅ Approve: Lock km + notify teacher ✏️ Edit: Adjust km/days if data seems wrong

❌ Reject: Request clarification (e.g., "Upload odometer photos")

Accountant’s Interface: "Mission Internationale + Avion" (What the accountant sees/does after teacher submits request)

Core Mission Details Teacher: Name, Department, Contact Destination: City/Country (e.g., "Paris, France")

Dates: Start/End (+ total days) 2. Financial & Logistics Section A. Flight Booking

Auto-Suggested Flights: System show options (price) from InternationCities.json B. Allowance Calculation

Daily Rate: 2,000 DH/day × [mission days]

Total Estimate:

Flight: €500 (≈5,000 DH) Allowance: 5 days × 2,000 DH = 10,000 DH Total: ~15,000 DH 4. Key Buttons & Actions Button Action "Book Flight" Reserve tickets (paid to airline) "Notify Teacher" Send flight details/documents needed "Approve Payout" Release allowance post-mission give me all the file names that i need to give to my pro programmer friend to help me do this implementation

User.php
:102-120

Reservation Interface Functionalities

Mission Nationale (National) Transport Mode Accountant Actions Key Features Voiture Personnelle (Personal Car) - Verify vehicle documents Calculate km compensation (e.g., 3 DH/km) Process daily allowance (1,000 DH/day) - No ticket booking Distance calculator tool Vehicle info validation Transport Public (Bus/Train) - Book/reimburse tickets Upload e-tickets Calculate daily allowance - Transport provider selection Cost tracking Receipt upload Mission Internationale (International) Transport Mode Accountant Actions Key Features Avion (Flight) - Book flights + hotels Upload e-tickets Process int'l allowance (2,000 DH/day) - Flight comparator Seat selection Visa requirement alerts so make the right changes for this and For National Missions (Morocco Only) City Selection: ✅ Yes, the teacher sees a dropdown of all Moroccan cities (pre-loaded in the system). Key Features for Teachers Smart Dropdown:

Shows only Moroccan cities (international missions use text field). Auto-Distance Calculator (if "Voiture Personnelle" selected) and i have all the cities and how far are they from the home uni in rabat file called cities.json Accountant's View Later Sees the teacher’s selected city + calculated km in the reservation interface. Accountant’s View for "Mission Nationale + Voiture Personnelle" (Simplified to only show critical info)

❌ Reject: Request clarification (e.g., "Upload odometer photos")

Hassan El Fassi Physique Atelier de formation 5-7 Mars 2023 3,000 DH Terminée Dr. Amina Berrada Mathématiques Conférence académique 15-18 Février 2023 12,500 DH Terminée Voir toutes les missions ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/prototype Bootstrap/chef Head/mission_validate.html` starting at line 281: ```html 15 Mai 2023 - 20 Mai 2023 (5 jours) Destination: Paris, France - Université de Paris
Détails financiers
Indemnité journalière:

2,000 DH/jour

Total indemnités:

10,000 DH (5 jours)

Frais de transport estimés:

3,500 DH

``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/AccountantController.php` starting at line 263: ```php $endDate = \Carbon\Carbon::parse($mission->end_date); $durationDays = $startDate->diffInDays($endDate) + 1; // Define daily allowance based on mission type $dailyAllowance = $mission->type === 'internationale' ? 2000 : 400; $allowanceAmount = $dailyAllowance * $durationDays; // Get transport costs from reservations $transportAmount = $mission->reservations()->sum('cost'); // Create or update payment $payment = Payment::updateOrCreate( ['mission_id' => $mission->id], [ 'user_id' => Auth::id(), 'allowance_amount' => $allowanceAmount, 'transport_amount' => $transportAmount, 'total_amount' => $allowanceAmount + $transportAmount, 'status' => 'paid', 'payment_method' => $request->payment_method, 'payment_reference' => $request->payment_reference, 'payment_date' => $request->payment_date, 'comments' => $request->comments, ] ); return redirect()->route('accountant.payments') ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/MissionController.php` starting at line 64: ```php 'soumise' => Auth::user()->missions()->where('status', 'soumise')->count(), 'validee_chef' => Auth::user()->missions()->where('status', 'validee_chef')->count(), 'validee_directeur' => Auth::user()->missions()->where('status', 'validee_directeur')->count(), 'billet_reserve' => Auth::user()->missions()->where('status', 'billet_reserve')->count(), 'terminee' => Auth::user()->missions()->where('status', 'terminee')->count(), 'rejetee' => Auth::user()->missions()->where('status', 'rejetee')->count(), ]; // Process missions to add some computed properties foreach ($missions as $mission) { // Add a human-readable date range $startDate = Carbon::parse($mission->start_date); $endDate = Carbon::parse($mission->end_date); $mission->date_range = $startDate->format('d/m/Y') . ' - ' . $endDate->format('d/m/Y'); // Add duration in days ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/edit.blade.php` starting at line 158: ```php
``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/show.blade.php` starting at line 210: ```php Validée par chef dép. @break @case('validee_directeur') Validée par directeur @break @case('billet_reserve') Billet réservé @break @case('terminee') Terminée @break @case('rejetee') Rejetée @break @default {{ $mission->status }} @endswitch
Objectif de la mission

{{ $mission->objective }}

@if($mission->documents->isNotEmpty())
Documents joints
``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/print.blade.php` starting at line 170: ```php Avion @break @default {{ $mission->transport_type }} @endswitch
@if($mission->supervisor_name)
Encadrant:
{{ $mission->supervisor_name }}
@endif
Fait à Rabat, le {{ $today }}
Signature de l'intéressé(e):
Le Doyen de la Faculté
Université Mohammed V de Rabat - Faculté des Sciences
``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/create.blade.php` starting at line 213: ```php document.getElementById('endDate').addEventListener('change', function() { const startDate = new Date(document.getElementById('startDate').value); const endDate = new Date(this.value); if (endDate < startDate) { alert('La date de fin ne peut pas être antérieure à la date de début.'); this.value = document.getElementById('startDate').value; } }); // Dynamic transport type based on mission type document.getElementById('missionType').addEventListener('change', function() { const transportTypeSelect = document.getElementById('transportType'); const hiddenTransportType = document.getElementById('hiddenTransportType'); if (this.value === 'internationale') { // For international missions, set transport to 'avion' and disable select transportTypeSelect.value = 'avion'; transportTypeSelect.disabled = true; transportTypeSelect.classList.add('bg-light'); // Enable the hidden input to ensure 'avion' is submitted hiddenTransportType.disabled = false; } else { // For national missions, enable the select ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/MissionController.php` starting at line 296: ```php $mission->formatted_start_date = Carbon::parse($mission->start_date)->format('d/m/Y'); $mission->formatted_end_date = Carbon::parse($mission->end_date)->format('d/m/Y'); $mission->duration = Carbon::parse($mission->start_date)->diffInDays(Carbon::parse($mission->end_date)) + 1; // Get the user (teacher) information $user = Auth::user(); // Get today's date for the document $today = Carbon::now()->format('d/m/Y'); // Generate a reference number if needed $reference = 'MIS-' . date('Y', strtotime($mission->created_at)) . '-' . sprintf('%03d', $mission->id); return view('teacher.missions.print', compact('mission', 'user', 'today', 'reference')); } } ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/DirectorController.php` starting at line 68: ```php for ($m = 1; $m <= 12; $m++) { $monthLabels[] = Carbon::create(null, $m, 1)->format('M'); $monthData[] = $missionsByMonth[$m] ?? 0; } // Get total budget for all departments $totalBudget = DepartmentSetting::sum('budget'); // Get department counts $departmentCount = User::whereNotNull('department') ->select('department') ->distinct() ->count(); // Get teacher counts $teacherCount = User::where('role', 'enseignant')->count(); // Get mission type distribution $missionTypes = [ 'nationale' => Mission::where('type', 'nationale')->count(), 'internationale' => Mission::where('type', 'internationale')->count(), ]; // Get popular destinations $popularDestinations = Mission::select('destination_city', DB::raw('count(*) as count')) ->groupBy('destination_city') ->orderByDesc('count') ->limit(5) ->get(); return view('director.dashboard', compact( 'user', 'pendingMissions', 'recentlyApprovedMissions', ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/teacher/proofs/create.blade.php` starting at line 127: ```php

Destination: {{ $mission->destination_city }}, {{ $mission->destination_institution }}

Type: {{ $mission->type === 'nationale' ? 'Mission nationale' : 'Mission internationale' }}

Status: @switch($mission->status) @case('soumise') Soumise @break @case('validee_chef') Validée (chef) @break @case('validee_directeur') ``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/show.blade.php` starting at line 381: ```php

Saisir le montant si applicable (ex: pour un titre de transport, une facture d'hôtel, etc.)
``` Here is a potentially relevant excerpt in `../../../../../../c:/Users/ziadn/OneDrive/Bureau/Mission APP 2 - Copy - Copy/mission-management/resources/views/director/mission_details.blade.php` starting at line 213: ```php

response.value:
**Plan:**
• List each file that contains or governs functionality related to mission reservations, teacher inputs for transportation and cities, and accountant views/calculations.  
• Include both controller files and view templates where changes are needed, plus the JSON files for city distances.

**Files to consider:**

- **mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/AccountantController.php**  
  (Handles reservation processing, payment calculation and ticket status)

- **mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/MissionController.php**  
  (Contains logic for mission dates & status, including duration and allowance)

- **mission-management/app/Http/Controllers/DirectorController.php**  
  (May require adjustments if dashboard or mission details are impacted)

- **mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/create.blade.php**  
  (Teacher’s mission submission – transport mode selection, dynamic city dropdown for national missions, and auto-distance calculator integration)

- **mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/edit.blade.php**  
  (Teacher mission editing including transport type fields)

- **mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/show.blade.php**  
  (Displays mission details including transport and status display)

- **mission-management/resources/views/teacher/missions/print.blade.php**  
  (For printing mission details with travel and financial info)

- **mission-management/resources/views/teacher/proofs/create.blade.php**  
  (For handling document uploads such as odometer photos)

- **mission-management/resources/views/director/mission_details.blade.php**  
  (Displays complete mission information on the director’s side)

- **mission-management/resources/views/accountant/reservations.blade.php**  
  (Interface for reservations processing: display of mission details, transport types, and financial calculations)

- **mission-management/resources/views/accountant/payments.blade.php**  
  (Handles payment details and status display)

- **mission-management/resources/views/director/reports.blade.php**  
  (May be impacted by changes to status and financial computations)

- **cities.json**  
  (Contains pre-loaded Moroccan cities with their distances from Rabat)

- **internationCities.json**  
  (Contains information for international flight suggestions)

- **User.php (lines 102–120)**  
  (User model likely defines relationships and attributes needed for these features)

Provide these file names to your pro programmer friend for implementing the described Reservation Interface functionalities.

metadata.helpTextPrefix: You can ask me general programming questions, or chat with the following participants which have specialized expertise and can perform actions:
metadata.helpTextVariablesPrefix: You can also help me understand your question by using the following variables to give me extra context:

helpTextPostfix.value:
To have a great conversation, ask me questions as if I was a real programmer:

* **Show me the code** you want to talk about by having the files open and selecting the most important lines.
* **Make refinements** by asking me follow-up questions, adding clarifications, providing errors, etc.
* **Review my suggested code** and tell me about issues or improvements, so I can iterate on it.

You can also ask me questions about your editor selection by [starting an inline chat session](command:inlineChat.start).

Learn more about [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot?tool=vscode&utm_source=editor&utm_medium=chat-panel&utm_campaign=2024q3-em-MSFT-getstarted) in [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/overview).
